title: Love in Georgian times
itunes:title: Love in Georgian times
itunes:subtitle: For our Valentine’s Day episode, historian Sally Holloway explores the nature of courtship, love and marriage in 18th-century Britain, highlighting the similarities and differences to the modern day
description:
For our Valentine’s Day episode, historian Sally Holloway explores the nature of courtship, love and marriage in 18th-century Britain, highlighting the similarities and differences to the modern day

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
